events.name: Grainger Engineering Alumni Campus Tour
events.description: Welcome back to Illinois! Join the ESTAR Engineering Tour Guides as they show you around new (and old!) campus spaces alike and talk about all that's new in Grainger Engineering.

events.name: Grainger Engineering General Campus Tours
events.location: Bardeen Quad between CIF and Grainger Library
events.description: Are you interested in seeing some of Grainger Engineering's state-of-the-art lab spaces? Do you want to talk to a current engineering student to see what life is really like in Grainger? Join the ESTAR Engineering Tour Guides as they show you all Grainger Engineering has to offer and more!

events.name: I'm Admitted! Grainger Engineering Welcome
times: College Resource Fair on Monumental Steps, Friday: 11:00am – 2:00pm
College Resource Fair on Monumental Steps, Saturday: 12:00pm – 2:00pm
events.description: Congratulations admitted new first-year and transfer engineering students! Start your Engineering Open House visit at the Campus Instructional Facility (CIF) monumental steps to receive a limited-edition gift while supplies last. Then join us for a Student Panel to meet a Dean and connect with current students. Stop by the College Resource Fair to learn about future opportunities and take a fun, commemorative photo!

events.name: Grainger Alumni Panel
events.description: Want to hear more about the amazing things UIUC Alumni have done after graduating? Come to our Alumni Panel to discuss current Alumni's careers, advice, and time at UIUC!

events.name: Mini Research Fair
events.description: Professors will have posters with their research, and undergraduates will be able to talk to them about the research they are doing.

events.name: Professor Panel
events.description: The professor panel is an opportunity for current and prospective students to ask professors about their fields, how to get involved with research, and pursuing academia/graduate school.

events.name: Alumni Coffee Chats
events.description: Students can get to know alumni in a more personal setting! This is a great opportunity to ask alums about their time at the U of I, the industries they work in, and how students can plan their lives after college.
